plot outline: Swapna (Ishitha) dreams of getting married into a joint family and in the process falls for Chanakya (Tanish). On the other hand, Chanakya is least smitten by her and ignores all her approaches. Things take a turn when Chanakya's family gets murdered which has something to do with Swapna's past.
title: Chanakyudu
plot: Swapna (Ishitha) dreams of getting married into a joint family and in the process falls for Chanakya (Tanish). On the other hand, Chanakya is least smitten by her and ignores all her approaches. Things take a turn when Chanakya's family gets murdered which has something to do with Swapna's past.
